item.description:
This is an introduction to a multi-dimensional energy healing modality which was recently translated from ancient Maharata texts. This information includes fascinating details about the multi-dimensional energetic structure of our bodies, as well as that of the cosmos in which we reside.

With this modality, practitioners are taught how to access and apply TOTALLY NATURAL healing frequencies from the 12th dimension and beyond... how to activate their higher sensory perception to scan clients for miasms and other blockages... and how to use light, sound and symbol codes to clear them.

Members are requested to bring their own refreshements.

DIRECTIONS: Take I-93 to exit #22 (there is no exit #21). Turn going north on Rt. 127 for approx 1.5 mi. till you come to a stop sign. Turn left, going north on Rt. 132 for approx 1.5 mi. till you see mailbox #298 on right side of the road.

Directly across the street (left side) you should see a Meetup sign at the end of the driveway. Go up the driveway and enter through the front door. (There will be a Meetup sign there also.) There is no need to knock. Just go on in and have a seat in the meeting room downstairs.

IMPORTANT: If, when traveling on Rt. 132, you come to a sign saying "ULCS Clinic", you have goon too far. That is the 2nd driveway into the property. Please turn around there and go back up the first driveway, since no parking is allowed in the 2nd driveway. Thank you.
item.name: Introduction to Advanced (Multi-Dimensional) Energy Healing
